metadata.dc:author: Montes Herrera, J L
metadata.dc:description: This paper analyses plates gives us to make osteosynthesis of lower jaws fractures, and also the absolute and relatives indications.
metadata.dc:title: Traumatología maxilofacial, uso de las fijaciones rígidas osteosíntesis a placas.
[Maxillofacial traumatology. Use of rigid osteosynthesis fixation with plates].
